1: Hehehe~ Are you here to seek power from me?
This is a deal with a demon, you know~
2: But unfortunately, it's 'not the time' yet~
It's not time for you to face your fate just yet~
3: Right now, you're still just a lost little lamb~
One who knows nothing and hasn’t realized anything yet~
5: Too bad♥ I'm a great demon~
I don't do things like that for you~
6: You’re giving off an awfully dangerous aura~
7: I can tell you’ve been holding it in for a long time, haven’t you?
8: Well~? You’re about to lose control, aren’t you ♥
That restless desire… is it about to spill out of your chest?
9: Even if this place is ruled by a demon—
it’s still a church, you know ♥
10: Speak out all your true desires ♥
12: And what exactly does that mean~?
13: Even though you were just gasping under my teasing~
14: let me crush it deep into the floor ♥
15: You can’t hold it back anymore, can you?
16: Come now ♥ show me that unrestrained desire—
I’m very curious to see what you’ll turn into next~
17: what a well-behaved little thing you are~ ♥
18: Fully exposed, self-aware of your own inferiority, utterly obedient—
a lost little lamb should always stay just like this ♥
19: Don’t move ♥ don’t even try to resist my power~
Not that you’re capable of it anymore~
20: Aww ♥ what’s wrong with you now?
Your breathing is already a mess and we’ve barely begun?
21: Ah ♥ all that sin in you…
23: You’re supposed to be confessing your sins~
but your mind has been completely taken over by desire, hasn’t it? ♥
24: As expected from a naughty child like you~
I’ll just have to punish you with something even harsher ♥
25: Nothing left to say now, is there~?
26: Your impulses, your anxiety, your gloom…
27: You can feel it, can’t you?
your heart growing emptier and emptier~
28: That’s right ♥ the deeper you sink,
the more I can satisfy your craving for salvation~
29: Come now… offer everything to me like a good little one ♥
That is the only reason you exist here, after all ♥♥
30: Just you wait, my little lamb♥
I'm gonna wring every last drop of sin out of you~

0: By the sweat of your brow you will eat
your food until you return to the ground,
since from it you were taken;
for dust you are and to dust you will return.
1: I have seen all the things that are done under the sun;
all of them are meaningless, a chasing after the wind.
2: And we know that all things work together
for good for those who love God,
who are called according to His purpose.
3: For all have sinned and fall
short of the glory of God.
4: For the vision is yet for an appointed time;
it speaks of the end and will not prove false.
Though it lingers, wait for it;
it will certainly come and will not delay.
5: like a burden too heavy to bear.

0: Jesus asked him, "What is your name?"
He replied, "My name is Legion, for we are many."
1: Then another sign appeared in heaven:
a great red dragon with seven heads and ten horns,
and on its heads were seven crowns. Its tail swept
a third of the stars from the sky and cast them to the earth
2: O shining one, son of the morning!
How have you fallen from heaven?
You who once laid nations low,
how have you been cast down to the earth?
3: And I saw a beast rising out of the sea.
It had ten horns and seven heads,
with ten crowns on its horns,
and blasphemous names on its heads.
4: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
I will fear no evil, for You are with me;
Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.
5: The Lord said to Satan, "Where have you come from?"
going back and forth upon it."
